summary: The comment section is overwhelmingly positive, reflecting a strong sense of national pride, religious harmony, and unity among Pakistanis and their supporters worldwide. Comments highlight the hospitality and kindness of Pakistani people, the respect and love for non-Muslim Pakistanis, and the pride in Pakistan's military achievements. The sentiment is one of solidarity and respect across different religions and nationalities, with minimal negativity or controversy.
title: Christian Pilot Crushed India; Hero in Pakistan
